text: ādaraṇīya mandiramāya ka'abaye allāhu manuṣyarāśiyuṭe nilanilpinuḷḷa ādhāramākkiyirikkunnu. ādaraṇīya māsaṁ,balimr̥gaṁ, avayuṭe kaḻuttile aṭayāḷappaṭṭakaḷ ennivayeyuṁ. niścayamāyuṁ ākāśabhūmikaḷiluḷḷatellāṁ allāhu aṟiyunnuvennuṁ avan ellā kāryaṅṅaḷekkuṟiccuṁ sūkṣma jñānamuḷḷavanāṇennuṁ niṅṅaḷ aṟiyānāṇit
